overview: AKB48 2013 Manatsu no Dome Tour ~Mada mada, Yaranakya Ikenai koto ga aru~, is AKB48's summer concert, along with Nissan Stadium.  Instead of just one dome concert, AKB48 will be touring Japan's 5 Big Domes as a concert instead.
tagline: Mada mada, Yaranakya Ikenai koto ga aru
title: AKB48 5 Big Dome Concert Tour
